Title: Bonus: Amy Porterfield has Tips for Entrepreneurs and Business Leaders
Description:
Joel talks with Amy Porterfield talk about her new book, Two Weeks Notice: Find the Courage to Quit Your Job, Make More Money, Work Where You Want, and Change the World. The talk about creative customer avatars, creating consistent content, sharing your story, unbossing, and so much more.

For more information on Amy's new book, visit www.twoweeksnoticebook.com.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
